casebody.data:
AFRICAN METHODIST EPISCOPAL ZION CHURCH and Smith Chapel African Methodist Zion Church, Inc., Plaintiffs,
v.
William Donald PARKER, Harry Truman Parker, Thomas Parker, Jeraldine Donatien, and; Trustees of Smith Chapel Methodist Church, Defendants. No. COA15-470. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Nov. 17, 2015.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

No Error.
